title: duplicate emails and notifications when i link gmail and yahoo accounts
content: i keep trying to find gmail help, but it keeps directing me here to ask a question, so here it is:  i have both a gmail and yahoo email accounts.  when i link them and look at all inboxes, most of the emails (and email notifications, when they were enabled) have duplicates.  when i open the dup's they are always to my yahoo account.  why is this happening and how do i fix it?  thanks!
